scripts.dev: npm run generate && cd ./packages/dmc_website && npm run dev
scripts.build: lerna bootstrap && npm run generate && cd ./packages/dmc_website && npm run build
scripts.publish-website: version=`grep '^  "version": ' package.json | sed 's/.*"\([0-9\.]*\)".*/\1/'` && cd ./packages/dmc_website/dist && git add . && git commit -m "Increased version to $version" && git push origin master
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test
